caption:
This photograph captures a scene on a waterway, featuring an elderly man and an industrial setting. The man, seated at the back of a small motorboat, is steering the vehicle. Dressed in casual attire, he wears a white cap, sunglasses, and a dark zip-up jacket over a light-colored shirt, paired with light slacks. His expression is serious and focused.

The boat appears to be moving away from a large industrial complex located at the water's edge. This facility includes several tall, cylindrical structures—silos or storage tanks, predominantly white with blue tops. These are lined up along a dock, reflecting on the water’s surface, which ripples with the movement of the boat. The background features a lush tree line under a clear blue sky, contrasting with the industrial foreground.

The photograph seems timed during the late afternoon, as indicated by the warm lighting and long shadows cast. This setting presents a blend of industrial activity and natural landscape, encapsulating a moment of navigation through a human-altered environment.
title: Natural gas installation on the bayou segnette is approximately five miles south of the westwego public boat launch
